騙.definition: to cheat; to swindle; to deceive; to get on (a horse etc) by swinging one leg over

騙供.definition: to cheat sb into confessing; to induce a confession

騙局.definition: a swindle; a trap; a racket; a scam; CL:場|场[chang3]

騙色.definition: to trick sb into having sex

騙走.definition: to cheat (sb out of sth); to swindle (sb out of sth)
